short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the annoying layout-shifting "People also search for" box from Google Search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE: Probably doesn't work anymore. Please send a PR on GitHub if you can fix this.

This extension removes the annoying "People also search for" box that pops up in Google Search and causes layout shift after a navigation.

NOTE: As Google serves variations of the layout of the search results page to different users, this extension might not work for a small amount of users. If you are able to fix this in your version, please submit a pull request to improve this extension for others.

https://github.com/ThomasOrlita/remove-people-also-search-for-box
